title: Advertising costs of Target in the U.S. 2010 to 2018
yAxis: Advertising spending in million U.S. dollars
summary: The Advertising costs Fiscal in the U.S. 2010 was Fiscal 2016 , who made 1600 spending .
The most costs Fiscal was 2014 , with just 1292 spending .

In second place was Fiscal 2017 with 1457 spending ; third place went to Fiscal 2018 with 1494 spending ; fourth place went to Fiscal 2010 with 1292 spending and fifth place went to Fiscal 2015 , who was 1434 spending .
gold: This timeline shows the advertising expenditure of Target in North America from 2010 to 2018 . In 2012 , Target 's ad spending amounted to 1.39 billion U.S. dollars .
